item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Footpath cycle way signage needed, 15th December
item.description:
The combine usage footpath - cycle way through Tooting Bec Common really needs permanent signage to state CYCLIST MUST GIVE WAY TO PEOPLE AND DOGS. I witnessed today a cyclist with an electric bike hitting a dog and near missed three ladies walking together. The cyclist sped off so there was no chance to obtain details. The dog was shaken up and was limping due to the collision. It could have been worse. This is the second incident I’ve seen in 3 months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Culverden Road, Balham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 15th December
item.description:
Someone with a white van put a lot of rubbish in front of the garage where our bakery staff park. ( Marlborough bakery) Mottingham At the back of the bakery there is small road to get access to the flats on top of the shops and the building next to the bakery. This road is becoming a spot for people to dump the rubbish like this person. Reg plate ( ds61xyz) or (d561xyz) I have the video and photos. Please can you remove this rubbish or help us please? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Beaconsfield Road, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
